summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.8°C) and outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 753 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1451 m), feels like temperature (up 5.7°C), outside temperature (up 4.0°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 752.8m lower than yesterday, 577.5m lower than the past week, 1451.4m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 745m minimum and 3580m maximum, with an average of 1233.6m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1811.1m and 2690m.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and the light is absent. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
